Name: Fire Lord Ozai
Hints: “You will learn respect, and suffering will be your teacher.”

Name: Jinora
Hints: “The world's in trouble... I have to go help.”

Name: Avatar Roku
Hints: “Some friendships are so strong they can even transcend lifetimes.”

Name: Avatar Kyoshi
Hints: “Only justice will bring peace.”

Name: Avatar Kuruk
Hints: “You must actively shape your destiny, and the destiny of the world.”

Name: Koh the Face Stealer
Hints: “You've already met them, actually.”

Name: Raava
Hints: “Do not give in to ten thousand years of darkness. You are the Avatar.”

Name: Vaatu
Hints: “To hate me is to give me breath. To fight me is to give me strength. Now prepare to face oblivion!”

Name: Aye-aye Spirit
Hints: “You have a good heart Stinky, but these fire tossers aren't like you.”

Name: President Raiko
Hints: “Stop! We surrender. Republic City is yours.”

Name: Sir Iknik Blackstone Varrick
Hints: “Yep, I like to think I'm always there to stand up for the little guy. Especially if that little guy can help this guy become a bigger guy!”

Name: Zhu Li Moon
Hints: “If you want me around, you need to start treating me like an equal!”

Name: General Iroh II
Hints: “Tell her we will be arriving in three days' time and that I look forward to winning back Republic City, together.”

Name: Tarrlok
Hints: “It'll be just like the good old days.”

Name: Tahno
Hints: “I barely broke a sweat! Anybody else wanna scrap with the champs?”

Name: Shiro Shinobi
Hints: “It's a knockout! What a wingdinger of a hat trick, folks!”

Name: Earth King Kuei
Hints: “If you're on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down.”

Name: Haru
Hints: “Thank you for bringing my father back to me. I never thought I'd see him again. I only wish there was some way...”

Name: Tyro
Hints: “Don't worry. I hear cowards float.”

Name: The Mechanist
Hints: “We're just in the process of improving upon what's already here, and after all, isn't that what nature does?”

Name: Teo
Hints: “The wind will carry you. It supports something inside you, something even lighter than air, and that something takes over when you fly.”

Name: June
Hints: “Wow, it's a real head scratcher. See ya.”

Name: Lao Beifong
Hints: “Who thinks they are so important they can just come to my home unannounced?”

Name: Poppy Beifong
Hints: “Well, shall we move to the living room for dessert, then?”

Name: The Boulder
Hints: “You may be big, but you ain't bad! ___ _______'s gonna win this in a landslide!”

Name: Big Bad Hippo
Hints: “_____ happy to see Blind Bandit!”

Name: Jin
Hints: “I have something for you, too. Now it's your turn to close your eyes.”

Name: Aunt Wu
Hints: “Your future is full of struggle and anguish. Most of it, self-inflicted.”

Name: Ghashiun
Hints: “Please! We'll escort you out of the desert! We'll help however we can!”

Name: Huu
Hints: “You think you're any different from me, or your friends, or this tree?”

Name: Tho
Hints: “Didn't know there was waterbenders anywhere but here. They got a nice swamp there, do they?”

Name: Due
Hints: “You too? That means we're kin!”

Name: Earth Queen Hou-Ting
Hints: [Sneezes] “Is there an animal in my presence?!”

Name: Prince Wu
Hints: “It's the most dynamite six-hour show you'll ever see in your life!”

Name: Fire Lord Sozin
Hints: “Without you, all my plans are suddenly possible.”

Name: Mai
Hints: “I guess you just don't know people as well as you think you do. You miscalculated.”

Name: Ty Lee
Hints: “Calm down, you guys. This much negative energy is bad for your skin. You'll totally break out”

Name: Ursa
Hints: “Everything I've done, I've done to protect you. Remember this... No matter how things may seem to change, never forget who you are.”

Name: Fire Lord Azulon
Hints: “I think Iroh has suffered enough. But you, your punishment has scarcely begun!”

Name: Shyu
Hints: “It was once the sages' duty. It is still our duty.”

Name: Yon Rha
Hints: “I'm afraid I'm not taking prisoners today.”

Name: Fire Lord Izumi
Hints: “The Fire Nation has spent too much of its history fighting nonsense wars, and I refuse to drag my nation into another one unless there's no other choice.”

Name: Chief Hakoda
Hints: “We lost today, but we've never been closer. We tasted victory, and that counts for something”

Name: Kya
Hints: “Just let her go, and I'll give you the information you want.”

Name: Kya II
Hints: “You seem to have some grandiose delusion that we had a perfect, happy-go-lucky childhood. Guess what? We didn't!”

Name: Bato
Hints: “For this is to be done right, I cannot help. You pass or fail on your own.”

Name: Chief Arnook
Hints: “Spirit of the Ocean! Spirit of the Moon! Be with us!”

Name: Kanna (Gran Gran)
Hints: “It's been so long since I've had hope, but you brought it back to life, my little waterbender.”

Name: Yagoda
Hints: “Are you here for the healing lesson?”

Name: Hahn
Hints: “Admiral Choi! Prepare to meet your fate!”

Name: Hama
Hints: “There's water in places you never think about.”

Name: Chief Tonraq
Hints: “I was protecting you from the shame I brought on the family.”

Name: Chief Unalaq
Hints: “You call yourself the bridge between the two worlds, but there shouldn't be a bridge; we should live together as one.”

Name: Eska
Hints: “Eternal darkness was upon us. I became caught up in the moment.”

Name: Desna
Hints: “I am so done with spirits.”

Name: Monk Gyatso
Hints: “We can't concern ourselves with what was. We must act on what is.”

Name: Ikki
Hints: “Being part of a family is hard, huh, Daddy?”

Name: Meelo
Hints: “You're pretty. Can I have some of your hair?”

Name: Bumi II
Hints: “Top Side, this is Papa Bear. The Breezies are in the hole. Cue the balloons.”

Name: Kai
Hints: “Just because I was blown out of the sky, and fell hundreds of feet down a cliff? Don't you know it takes more than that to get rid of me?”

Name: Opal Beifong
Hints: “I don't care about the oath! I have to save my family!”

Name: Suyin Beifong
Hints: “No wonder Tenzin ended things with you years ago.”

Name: Baatar
Hints: “Sorry, dear, I'm going to have to take dinner to my office. I just had a major breakthrough on the tram station model.”

Name: Baatar Jr.
Hints: “And you of all people should realize that once a discovery is made, it is our responsibility as scientists to pursue it as far as we can. Wherever it leads.”

Name: Huan Beifong
Hints: “You're crushing my individuality!”

Name: Wei Beifong
Hints: “I wanna power disc your face.”

Name: Wing Beifong
Hints: “I can't believe I'm sparring with the Avatar!”

Name: Aiwei
Hints: “You have no idea what is coming for you, Avatar.”

Name: King Bumi
Hints: “Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad.”

Name: Master Pakku
Hints: “You have disrespected me, my teachings, and my entire culture!”

Name: Master Jeong Jeong
Hints: “Destiny? What would a boy know of destiny? If a fish lives it's whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny?”

Name: Master Piandao
Hints: “I think I'm a little old to be fighting the Avatar.”

Name: Zaheer
Hints: “When you base your expectations only on what you see, you blind yourself to the possibilities of a new reality.”

Name: Ming-Hua
Hints: “We could have just taken the elevator. Show-off.”

Name: Ghazan
Hints: “I'm never going back to prison. If I'm going down today, you're coming with me!”

Name: P'Li
Hints: “Years apart only made my love for you stronger...You've shown me what true freedom means.”

Name: Jet
Hints: “Have you forgotten that the Fire Nation killed your mother? Remember why you fight!”

Name: Pipsqueak
Hints: “Listen, Sokka. Jet's a great leader. We follow what he says, and things always turn out okay.”

Name: Smellerbee
Hints: “As long as I'm confident with who I am, it doesn't matter what other people think.”

Name: Longshot
Hints: “There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.”

Name: The Duke
Hints: “Hey, Jet, these barrels are filled of blasting jelly!”

Name: Lieutenant
Hints: “You benders need to understand ... there's no place in the world for you anymore.”

Name: Avatar Aang
Hints: “I wasn't there when the Fire Nation attacked my people. I'm gonna make a difference this time.”

Name: Avatar Korra
Hints: “No matter what happens, no matter how crazy things get, I'll always try to restore balance.”

Name: Senna
Hints: “We knew one day the world would need you, and you wouldn't need us anymore.”

Name: Katara
Hints: “I will never, ever turn my back on people who need me!”

Name: Sokka
Hints: “You think you're so smart, with your fancy little words. This is not so hard”

Name: Toph Beifong
Hints: “Alright, let's break some rules!”

Name: Suki
Hints: “Sorry Warden. You're my prisoner now.”

Name: Zuko
Hints: “You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it! And now I can give it back!”

Name: Uncle Iroh
Hints: “In the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.”

Name: Azula
Hints: “Maybe you should worry less about the tides, who've already made up their mind about killing you, and worry more about me, who's still mulling it over.”

Name: Mako
Hints: “Looks like you had some car trouble. Good thing the police are here.”

Name: Bolin
Hints: “You're a bad idea!”

Name: Asami Sato
Hints: “People usually assume that I'm daddy's helpless little girl, but I can handle myself.”

Name: Hiroshi Sato
Hints: “I know what you all must think of me, but I love Republic City, and I would do anything to save her.”

Name: Lin Beifong
Hints: “You need to make decisions based on what you want. Don't make the same mistakes I did.”

Name: Tenzin
Hints: “As long as I'm breathing, it's not over.”

Name: Pema
Hints: “Watching my soulmate spend his life with the wrong woman became too painful.”

Name: Amon/Noatak
Hints: “Our showdown, while inevitable, is premature.”

Name: Kuvira
Hints: “Stop groveling as if this is the worst day of your life. This is a good day.”

Name: Avatar Wan
Hints: “Haven't you heard the legends? I'm not a regular human anymore.”

Name: Wan Shi Tong
Hints: “You think you're the first person to believe their war was justified?”

Name: Rangi
Hints: “If I were better at my job you would never feel scared. Only loved. Adored by all.”

Name: Jianzhu
Hints: “The responsibility of keeping the Earth Kingdom stable and in balance with the other nations rightfully belongs to the Avatar. I'm only a stopgap measure. A substitute.”

Name: Kelsang
Hints: “I violated my beliefs as an airbender. I let my teachers down. I let my entire people down.”

Name: Hei-Ran
Hints: “The stability of the Fire Nation is more important than my life.”

Name: Tagaka
Hints: “How would you like a taste of true freedom? To go where you want and take what you're owed?”

Name: Lek
Hints: “I learned how to earthbend, and I swore an oath that I'd never miss a target again.”

Name: Kirima
Hints: “I'm not going to pass up the chance to go down in history as the Avatar's waterbending master.”

Name: Wong
Hints: “No one's dead, but I had to get information the old-fashioned way from some mercenaries dressed in guards' clothing. I may have gone a little overboard. I don't regret it.”

Name: Jinpa
Hints: “I believe I have to make peace with my own choices, just like everyone else.”

Name: Admiral Zhao
Hints: “Look at you. You were once so great. I can't believe my former master has become nothing more than a simple savage.”

Name: General Fong
Hints: “You could save her if you were in the Avatar State!”

Name: Long Feng
Hints: “Now comes the part where I double-cross you.”

Name: Xin Fu
Hints: “I think the Fire Nation will pay a hefty price for the Avatar. Now, get out of my ring.”

Name: Master Yu
Hints: “If you pay for the whole year in advance, I'll bump you up to the next belt.”

Name: Song
Hints: “The Fire Nation has hurt you ... It's okay. They've hurt me, too.”

Name: On Ji
Hints: “Don't worry. I'm not a tattletale.”
